short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Validate your Meta pixel installation to make sure your ad tracking and audience collection work properly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Easy Pixel Helper is an advanced troubleshooting tool designed to validate your Meta Pixel setup with precision. Operating seamlessly in the background, it identifies if events are firing correctly and delivers immediate feedback on your implementation. An indicator on the Easy Pixel Helper icon displays the number of pixel events fired. When you click on it, a comprehensive panel opens, providing a clear summary of the page's pixel statusâ€”offering reliable insights without the errors or warnings common to other solutions.
